div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2245 Licata (anc. Phintias), 1899-1900 (619) Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Robinson) Contents: c. 190 AR Carthage: half-shekels (from S. Italy) Disposition: Syracuse 4 Orsi, RIN 1900, pp. 90-1 Cesano, TINC 1936, pp. 60-1, illus. Robinson, NC 1964, pp. 45-6 Currò Pisanò, AIIN 1962-4, pp. 221, 238
